_source.name: S2E4 Country Girls
_source.shortDescription: LEGO Friends video - The Power of Friendship - Season 2 Episode 4 Country Girls
_source.title: S2E4. Country Girls

characters.description:
Andrea is a natural performer and she WILL become a star! On and off the stage, she’ll act, sing, entertain and dance her way through life. But don’t let all the drama fool you – she knows she needs to work hard to perfect her musical talent (also because Mia kindly reminds her). She’s not afraid of hard work as such, but it IS nice when you can reward yourself with new costumes or a beauty treatment after!

Loves: singing, having FUN, using her talent to make a difference in the world, feeling spoiled.

Not so crazy about: Being told “no”, horseback riding, listening to others talking for too long.
characters.name: Andrea
characters.title: Andrea

characters.description:
Emma is an artist. She can’t go anywhere without drawing, painting or taking pictures of all the beautiful things she sees. She has the quirkiest brain: she can imagine and create things no one else can. She loves telling jokes, even if no one else gets them. She really wants to keep secrets but it’s just SO HARD! She trusts in the best in everyone, even if they don’t always deserve it.

Loves: Art, drawing, having fun, seeing the world through crazy, homemade glasses, starting new creative projects.

Not so crazy about: finishing creative projects, deciding which idea to go with or keeping track of time.
characters.name: Emma
characters.title: Emma

characters.description:
Mia is an adventurer who loves animals and being outdoors. In fact, she’s pretty sure her horse Bella understands her better than most people. She gets things done, and often while her four best friends are still discussing how to do it! She knows who she is and never worries much about what other people think of her. She doesn’t like gossip or small talk. Just be honest with her, she’ll see right through anyone who isn’t! And she’s not afraid to let them know.

Loves: skateboarding, animals, nature, honesty, alone time.

Not so crazy about: long discussions, people who tell her something is impossible.
characters.name: Mia
characters.title: Mia

characters.description:
Olivia loves everything that has to do with coding, gadgets, inventions, engineering and mechanics. She’s a bit of a “Mad Scientist”, but she only uses her powers for good. Need to get out of a tight spot? She’ll create a device or robot to fix it. Her online networks help her with her experiments, but she loves that her real life friends can lure her out of the lab, too. Sometimes you just have to dance crazy with your BFFs.

Loves: SCIENCE Using everyday things for new inventions, learning everything about everything.

Not so crazy about: people who don’t think before they act, or don’t understand why she used THEIR things to build a new invention…
characters.name: Olivia
characters.title: Olivia

characters.description:
Stephanie is an amazing swimmer and lifeguard. Health and sports are her passion. She loves being around her four BFFs, organizing their daily events, nurturing any hurt feelings and coaching them toward victory. She sets high standards for herself. She loves helping others, but she sometimes freaks out when she feels like it’s all down to her.

Loves: planning new missions, going on rescue missions, secret missions, helping others be the best they can be.

Not so crazy about: being alone, risk of failing at something, improvising.
characters.name: Stephanie
characters.title: Stephanie

_source.description: What does the perfect LEGO Friends go-kart look like? Our two builders, Apheni and Grace, are ready to put their creativity to the test and give us their versions of the coolest race cars. The team will have just TWO minutes to help each other customize and personalize their go-karts, and get ready to race and play with all of their hearts!
_source.name: LL_Friends_Video_HeartlakeRacingChallenge_US_Aug18
_source.shortDescription: LEGO® Friends Heartlake Racing Challenge
_source.title: LEGO® Friends The Ultimate Heartlake Racing Challenge!

trackingData.name: LEGO® Friends The Ultimate Heartlake Racing Challenge!

_source.description: From paint tubes to go-kart blueprints, Emma turns everything she touches into shining works of art. She’s not afraid to get her hands dirty while she works. Elbow grease should be part of every artist’s toolbox! Because go-karts can’t win a race on looks alone. Even if the design is perfect, you still need a team of star drivers who are willing to work hard together to race them to victory. Leave it to Emma and her custom go-kart to find creative new ways to help her team of Friends win this race! She knows just how to give the audience at the Heartlake City go-kart championship an artistic show of racing power.

_source.description: If you blink, you might miss Andrea as she zoom-zooms past you in her cool, customized go-kart with her favorite hits blasting from the giant speakers! An entertainer at heart, Andrea feels right at home on the Heartlake City go-kart race track. She knows how to keep the crowd entertained and she is determined to give them the best show ever and let her music drown out the engine noise! And is there any better way to motivate her Friends to work as a team than with a catchy team song? Watch out for Andrea at the finish line!

_source.description: While admiring the nature in Heartlake City Park, LEGO® Friends Mia and her brother pass a tree that would make the perfect place for a tree house for her and her friends. With Mia’s imagination and creativity, the possibilities are endless when it comes to building. But what’s this?! A big angry bird is scaring a baby robin? What can Mia and her brother do to help the baby bird? It’s loads of fun with LEGO bricks as Mia and her brother solve this latest mission challenge.
_source.name: Mia Builds a Treehouse Heartlake City Missions
_source.shortDescription: Mia from LEGO® Friends discovers a tree in Heartlake City Park that would make the perfect treehouse for her and her friends to plan their missions. But first she must deal with a big angry bird who is bullying a young robin!

But something is missing. Her mission: build a soccer goal! And, of course, no practice goal is complete without a moving goalkeeper platform!

set.description: Keep training with Stephanie at her Soccer Practice in Heartlake City Park, and you’ll soon have the best aim in all of Heartlake! Use the shoot function to launch the ball toward the goal and then move Stephanie’s platform from side to side to help her make an acrobatic save. You can play on your own or with a friend! Help puppy Dash fetch the ball, then take a break with a drink and hot dog while checking out the strategy board.

_source.description: Andrea, Mia, Emma, Olivia, and Stephanie have given the old, abandoned fire station a gigantic makeover! Now it serves as their Heartlake City headquarters. They can plan missions on their secret mission board. Their first mission: bring a little more heart into the world! Like fixing other people’s bikes and things in the garage, taking care of lost pets, cooking a meal for someone who needs it, or just saving Heartlake City!

set.description: The girls from Heartlake City have taken over the old fire station and turned it into the ultimate LEGO® Friends headquarters! Relax in the rooftop hot tub, get creative in Emma’s craft room or enjoy Andrea’s performance terrace. There goes the old fire alarm—the girls have a new mission! Make popcorn in the kitchen and spin the bedroom TV to reveal the secret mission screen. Once briefed, slide down the fireman's pole and speed off on Olivia's bike!

_source.description:
What is more fun than splashing around with your friends in a pool, when it’s summer and hot? Andrea and Martina certainly love it, and play around the Heartlake Summer Pool every summer! 

Who is a real daredevil and dare to jump into the water from the springboard? Who can make a big splash? Or even go down the water slide? 

After a long super fun splashing day with your friends, nothing is better than to enjoy the sunset in the jacuzzi.
_source.name: 41313 Andrea Pool
_source.shortDescription: 41313 – Heartlake Summer Pool – Products – Friends LEGO.com
_source.title: 41313 – Heartlake Summer Pool

trackingData.name: 41313 – Heartlake Summer Pool

set.description: Make a splash with Andrea and Martina as they whizz down the slide and into the pool! Spring off the diving board, practice some lengths and then head over to the swim-up bar for a cold drink. Chill out in the hot tub and relax with a newspaper on the day bed. Freshen up in the restroom, or take a refreshing shower behind the aquarium. This is where the Heartlake City friends come to have fun in the sun!

image.alt: LEGO Friends - 41313 Heartlake Summer Pool - Andrea relaxes in the pool and Martina takes a ride on the water slide and splashes into the pool.

thumbnail.alt: LEGO Friends - 41313 Heartlake Summer Pool - Andrea relaxes in the pool and Martina takes a ride on the water slide and splashes into the pool.

_source.description: Race through Heartlake City in LEGO® Friends: Heartlake Rush! This fast, fun, and furious endless runner puts you in the driver’s seat as you jump, duck, and swerve through the busy streets in your LEGO racer! Can you complete all 60 levels? Drive as Andrea, Mia, Olivia, Emma, Stephanie, or their friends as you zip through the city and collect coins and other special items. Unlock decorations, new vehicles, and new playable characters! Find and collect Zobo, and he’ll transform your racer into a jet plane soaring above Heartlake City!
_source.name: Heartlake Rush App
_source.title: LEGO® Friends Heartlake Rush

trackingData.name: LEGO® Friends Heartlake Rush

_source.description: Just like you, the LEGO® Friends can be whoever they want to be – anytime, anywhere. What do YOU want to be? Turn things you know upside down and see what happens. Put on a talent show with your friends like Andrea. Go horse jumping like Stephanie. Build robots or bake cupcakes like Olivia. Have fun with friends at home like Mia. Paint pictures or make sculptures like Emma. Think the sky is the limit? Why stop there when you can even explore space? Be curious, build - and just be yourself.
_source.name: Curious at Heart 60 sec
_source.shortDescription: LEGO® Friends inspire kids to explore anything from dollhouse roleplay to art, outdoor adventures, performing on stage or challenging nature and science!
_source.title: Who do you want to be Today? – fun Things to play with your Friends | LEGO® Friends

_source.description: For artists of all ages, nothing is more important than finding your muse. Someone who inspires you. But what if that someone is the same person who tries to paint over YOUR artwork? Emma from LEGO® Friends meets an unexpected partner in crime in Pranksy, the mysterious graffiti artist who roams the streets and spray-paints the walls of downtown Heartlake City. Who is he? And can they find a way to work together and use their art to inspire and help their friends?
_source.name: IP Awareness mini-episode - Emma
_source.shortDescription: Artists can always find ways to express themselves on any canvas. Emma from LEGO® Friends shares her art tips and experience for creative kids.
_source.title: How to Find Your Muse – Emma’s Cool Art Tips for Kids | LEGO® Friends

trackingData.name: How to Find Your Muse – Emma’s Cool Art Tips for Kids | LEGO® Friends

_source.description:
This creative girl builder became a deep-sea explorer! Erika Bergman is a chief submarine pilot with National Geographic, and she thinks building while playing is awesome for kids – and it might just help save the planet too. Watch and discover why! 

Take a look at LEGO.com/friends/sealiferescue and find out more about the LEGO® Friends & National Geographic Kids partnership, creative play, and LEGO Friends Sea Life Rescue
_source.name: Why kids who build and play creatively go far - LEGO Friends
_source.shortDescription: Why kids who build and play creatively go far – LEGO® Friends
_source.title: Why kids who build and play creatively go far – LEGO® Friends

trackingData.name: Why kids who build and play creatively go far – LEGO® Friends

_source.description: Olivia is a tech-savvy genius. She has invented cool new apps and gadgets to help her Friends drive like champions when their go-karts hit the tracks – and beat the competition to the finish line. She has programmed her robot, Zobo, to help her in the Creative Tuning Shop. He helps her install, test and analyze all her latest ideas and prototypes. But what works on computers is only one part of succeeding – you need a team of drivers to put the go-karts to the test in real life, too. Good thing her best Friends are always ready to help her test the tracks and come up with new ideas together!
_source.name: Meet Techie Olivia - LEGO Friends Character Spot
_source.shortDescription: Meet Olivia the Techie! – LEGO® Friends Videos and Webisodes – LEGO.com
_source.title: Meet Techie Olivia! – LEGO® Friends Character Spot

characters.description:
Andrea is a natural performer and she WILL become a star! On and off the stage, she’ll act, sing, entertain and dance her way through life. But don’t let all the drama fool you – she knows she needs to work hard to perfect her musical talent (also because Mia kindly reminds her). She’s not afraid of hard work as such, but it IS nice when you can reward yourself with new costumes or a beauty treatment after!

Loves: singing, having FUN, using her talent to make a difference in the world, feeling spoiled.

Not so crazy about: Being told “no”, horseback riding, listening to others talking for too long.
characters.name: Andrea
characters.title: Andrea

trackingData.name: Meet Techie Olivia! – LEGO® Friends Character Spot

_source.description:
Are you a passionate soul? If so, then you need to watch this NEW must-see
mini movie from LEGO® Friends! Heartlake City’s LEGO Friends are filled with passion - and that passion is contagious! Andrea loves to sing music and perform for the crowds, Emma lives and breathes artistic creation, and Olivia is a tech-genius extraordinaire. They never know when inspiration will hit, or how their talents will come in handy. And when they find someone that sees the world the way they do, sparks fly! Instead of working alone, they can now work together and
accomplish so much more than they could have individually. Are you passionate about something? Make sure to tell us in the comments!
_source.name: Compilation Passion
_source.shortDescription: Heartlake City’s LEGO® Friends Andrea, Emma, and Olivia are extremely passionate individuals whose talents affect those around them in countless ways!
_source.title: Robots? Art? Music? Science? Tech? – What is Your passion? – LEGO® Friends

trackingData.name: Robots? Art? Music? Science? Tech? – What is Your passion? – LEGO® Friends

_source.description: Meet Mia and her family at their beautiful LEGO® Friends house in the forest. Help LEGO Friends Mia care for her horse Metzie at their cabin in the woods, then saddle him/her up to go for a ride. And don’t forget some carrots for the rabbit! Inside, her dad Angus whizzes up some smoothies in the kitchen, while her mom Ann lays up the table for a family lunch. Later, help Mia pull on her skates and perform some tricks while Mom snaps away with the camera. And after all that fresh forest air, Mia's ready for a rest. Help her clamber up her cool climbing wall to her room, where she can relax in her bunk bed.
_source.name: 41369 Mia House
_source.title: Mia's House

trackingData.name: Mia's House

_source.description: Hitch a ride with Stephanie as she travels to the lakeside for some outdoor fun. Jump into her funky buggy with Dash the dog, attach the trailer to carry her her bike and paddleboard, and head out for a day of activity. Open up the trailer to find a bone for Dash, and Stephanie's water bottle and tennis racket. Help her unpack her helmet, life vest and paddle from the trailer, and she's away! After all that action it's time for a snack. Light the campfire with Stephanie and toast some marshmallows as the sun goes down.
_source.name: 41364 Stephanie Buggy Trailer
_source.title: Stephanie's Buggy & Trailer

_source.description: There’s a yummy scent in the air—it’s freshly baked cupcakes! Help LEGO® Friends Olivia out in her newly opened Cupcake Café. Explore all the cool hi-tech features Olivia has invented to help her bake. Choose the most tempting creation from the rotating server or make your own treats at the crazy cupcake dispenser machine. Help Zobo the robot serve LEGO Friends Emma at the milk dispenser and the cash register. Roll up your sleeves as it looks like Olivia may need help in the kitchen... What's that smell? Burnt cupcake! Save the best ones and load them on to the scooter to sell around Heartlake City.
_source.name: 41366 Olivia Cupcake Shop
_source.title: Olivia's Cupcake Café

_source.description: Have fun with LEGO® bricks and Andrea from LEGO Friends, entertainer extraordinaire! While rehearsing for her concert in Heartlake City Park, a father and his crying child enter the scene. Andrea becomes a girl on a mission as she and her pet parrot do everything they can to comfort the crying infant and help the father.  Andrea pulls out all of her creativity and imagination, but nothing works. Is there anything that she can do to calm an upset child? Join Andrea and her pet parrot as they solve another mission in Heartlake City.
_source.name: Andrea Comforts a Crying Baby Heartlake City Missions
_source.shortDescription: Andrea from LEGO® Friends is preparing for her big performance in Heartlake City Park when – oh no! – a crying baby enters the scene! Is there anything she and her pet parrot can do to comfort the newborn?
_source.title: Andrea Comforts a Crying Baby – Heartlake City Missions

_source.description: Meet Stephanie. You can… She’s so fast it’s almost impossible to catch a glimpse of her. She’s on a mission, the clock is ticking, and there’s no time to stop! She must use all her planning and soccer skills to pull off a wild chase on the streets of Heartlake City!
_source.name: meet-stephanie
_source.shortDescription: Say hello to fierce and fun Stephanie in this video from LEGO® Friends. She is on a mission with no time to stop, and she must use all of her skills.
_source.title: Meet the LEGO® Friends – Stephanie

characters.description:
Stephanie is an amazing swimmer and lifeguard. Health and sports are her passion. She loves being around her four BFFs, organizing their daily events, nurturing any hurt feelings and coaching them toward victory. She sets high standards for herself. She loves helping others, but she sometimes freaks out when she feels like it’s all down to her.

Loves: planning new missions, going on rescue missions, secret missions, helping others be the best they can be.

Not so crazy about: being alone, risk of failing at something, improvising.
characters.name: Stephanie
characters.title: Stephanie

_source.description: Meet Andrea. Her mission in life is to have fun, and make others happy with her music and performance. Sometimes she does it so well, she doesn’t even know when it happens! As she dances her way through Heartlake City to meet her friends, she brightens the day for – almost – everyone around her!

_source.description: Meet Andrea, Mia, Emma, Olivia and Stephanie. They’re five best friends. And they’re on a new, heroic mission: to save Heartlake City from wily, swindling… swindlers! And kids and pets in danger, and beautiful buildings from bulldozers and graffiti, and who knows what else? From their new headquarters – the Friendship House – and their cool new Mission Vehicle, their plan takes shape: It’s time to bring a little more heart, art and courage into the world!
_source.name: girls-on-a-mission
_source.shortDescription: The five LEGO® Friends are on a mission to save their city in this video! They combine their diverse creative thinking and put their hearts into it.
_source.title: Girls on a mission – Heartlake City

trackingData.name: Girls on a mission – Heartlake City

_source.description: Mia and her brother Daniel want to hang out in their old tree house. It’s pizza night, after all! But when it starts pouring down, Mia’s poor bunny Mimì is caught in the rain! Their mission: build a bunny shelter before Mimì gets drenched! And who knew, even cold pizza tastes great when you’re having fun helping others!
_source.name: Mias Tree House 41335
_source.shortDescription: Mia’s Tree House 41335 – LEGO® Friends – Product animation
_source.title: Mia’s Tree House 41335 – LEGO® Friends – Product animation

characters.description:
Emma is an artist. She can’t go anywhere without drawing, painting or taking pictures of all the beautiful things she sees. She has the quirkiest brain: she can imagine and create things no one else can. She loves telling jokes, even if no one else gets them. She really wants to keep secrets but it’s just SO HARD! She trusts in the best in everyone, even if they don’t always deserve it.

Loves: Art, drawing, having fun, seeing the world through crazy, homemade glasses, starting new creative projects.

Not so crazy about: finishing creative projects, deciding which idea to go with or keeping track of time.

characters.description:
Olivia loves everything that has to do with coding, gadgets, inventions, engineering and mechanics. She’s a bit of a “Mad Scientist”, but she only uses her powers for good. Need to get out of a tight spot? She’ll create a device or robot to fix it. Her online networks help her with her experiments, but she loves that her real life friends can lure her out of the lab, too. Sometimes you just have to dance crazy with your BFFs.

Loves: SCIENCE Using everyday things for new inventions, learning everything about everything.

Not so crazy about: people who don’t think before they act, or don’t understand why she used THEIR things to build a new invention…
characters.name: Olivia
characters.title: Olivia

characters.description:
Mia is an adventurer who loves animals and being outdoors. In fact, she’s pretty sure her horse Bella understands her better than most people. She gets things done, and often while her four best friends are still discussing how to do it! She knows who she is and never worries much about what other people think of her. She doesn’t like gossip or small talk. Just be honest with her, she’ll see right through anyone who isn’t! And she’s not afraid to let them know.

Loves: skateboarding, animals, nature, honesty, alone time.

Not so crazy about: long discussions, people who tell her something is impossible.
characters.name: Mia
characters.title: Mia

set.description: Help Mia turn her brother’s tree house into the perfect park hangout spot for all her friends. Pack Daniel’s belongings into a box in the roof before he leaves for college, and help Mia decorate by putting up pictures of her friends and family. Scramble up the net to the second floor and use the water gun to keep out any unwanted visitors! Then slide down the zip wire to visit Mia's bunny Mimì in her little house and give her a carrot.

_source.description: Think you have to be a mad scientist to build your own robots? Not necessary! You just need a bit of curiosity and creativity. Olivia from LEGO® Friends loves creating and coding new gadgets and tech toys to get around town, save the town, and almost everything in between. Watch some of the amazing drones, programs and machines she has built. And find out what you can do if your inventions don’t work out as planned the first time. Or the second. (Or even third…)
_source.name: Why Tech Makes Everything Better Olivias Funny Robot Ideas
_source.shortDescription: Children are almost never too young to start building robots. Be inspired when Olivia from LEGO® Friends shares her fun robot tips and advice for kids!
_source.title: Why Tech Makes Everything Better – Olivia’s Funny Robot Ideas | LEGO® Friends

trackingData.name: Why Tech Makes Everything Better – Olivia’s Funny Robot Ideas | LEGO® Friends

_source.description: Mia is in total control of all kinds of horse power. Whether it’s at the stables with her own horse, or in her custom go-kart on the race track, she makes the most of both worlds. And she can’t wait to help her Friends beat the competition to the finish line in the Heartlake City go-kart championship. Mia believes that winning a race shouldn’t be at the cost of Mother Nature. She has built a custom go-kart engine that turns trash into top-tuned fuel! What a great way to keep tracks clean and energy green!
_source.name: Meet nature-loving Mia - LEGO Friends Character Spot
_source.shortDescription: Meet nature-loving Mia! – LEGO® Friends Videos and Webisodes – LEGO.com
_source.title: Meet nature-loving Mia! – LEGO® Friends Character Spot

trackingData.name: Meet nature-loving Mia! – LEGO® Friends Character Spot

_source.description: What better way to celebrate Friendship Day (or any other day, really :D) than with a fun LEGO® Friends build-along event? Apheni and Grace are back, and ready to try out all the cool builds from the 41346 Friendship Box together. And this time, they’re joined by their friends for even more fun and games! With this set, you and your friends can build and play with life-size LEGO Friends walkie-talkies, a trophy, Zobo the robot, a camera, and a microphone. They’re so easy to build: Just find the right bag, and follow the building instructions. Who will you invite over to build and play with all your hearts?
_source.name: Friendship Box Build and Dance-Along LEGO Friends Videos
_source.shortDescription: Two friends set the stage for the ultimate LEGO® Friends Dance-Along event with a life-size LEGO camera, trophy and microphone from the 41346 Friendship Box.
_source.title: Friendship Box Build & Dance-Along! – LEGO® Friends Videos

trackingData.name: Friendship Box Build & Dance-Along! – LEGO® Friends Videos

_source.description: Meet Emma from LEGO® Friends, an aspiring creative character who can bring out beauty and inspire creativity in everyone she meets. Join Emma and her cat for a day of imagination and inspiration in Heartlake City Park. Help her paint a portrait of her friends – it will make a great gift for them! It’s a day of friends having fun in the sun. LEGO® Friends – we’ve got heart!
_source.name: Emma Shares Her Art with Heart Heartlake City Missions

_source.description: Andrea from LEGO® Friends is a singing super star sensation in Heartlake City. Her dream is to perform for fans all over the world. She wants to teach her sister, Liz, all about how to make it in music, too. After all, she is Andrea’s most important fan! But Liz has some pretty cool creative talents of her own: numbers, science experiments and building robots. Can the two sisters learn from each other or even agree on what it takes to become a super star?
_source.name: IP awareness mini-episode - Andrea
_source.shortDescription: Andrea from LEGO® Friends is a singing sensation, but her sister’s talents for science experiments and building robots make her a super star too!
_source.title: Music or Science Super Star | LEGO® Friends

trackingData.name: Music or Science Super Star | LEGO® Friends

_source.description: Andrea makes friends with a cute little songbird with a beautiful voice. She gets an idea. Performing with friends is much more fun than when you’re alone! Her mission: build a stage in Heartlake City! The two can sing a concert together, put on a puppet show, and much more to entertain the park guests!

characters.description:
Emma is an artist. She can’t go anywhere without drawing, painting or taking pictures of all the beautiful things she sees. She has the quirkiest brain: she can imagine and create things no one else can. She loves telling jokes, even if no one else gets them. She really wants to keep secrets but it’s just SO HARD! She trusts in the best in everyone, even if they don’t always deserve it.

Loves: Art, drawing, having fun, seeing the world through crazy, homemade glasses, starting new creative projects.

Not so crazy about: finishing creative projects, deciding which idea to go with or keeping track of time.
characters.name: Emma
characters.title: Emma

characters.description:
Andrea is a natural performer and she WILL become a star! On and off the stage, she’ll act, sing, entertain and dance her way through life. But don’t let all the drama fool you – she knows she needs to work hard to perfect her musical talent (also because Mia kindly reminds her). She’s not afraid of hard work as such, but it IS nice when you can reward yourself with new costumes or a beauty treatment after!

Loves: singing, having FUN, using her talent to make a difference in the world, feeling spoiled.

Not so crazy about: Being told “no”, horseback riding, listening to others talking for too long.
characters.name: Andrea
characters.title: Andrea

characters.description:
Olivia loves everything that has to do with coding, gadgets, inventions, engineering and mechanics. She’s a bit of a “Mad Scientist”, but she only uses her powers for good. Need to get out of a tight spot? She’ll create a device or robot to fix it. Her online networks help her with her experiments, but she loves that her real life friends can lure her out of the lab, too. Sometimes you just have to dance crazy with your BFFs.

Loves: SCIENCE Using everyday things for new inventions, learning everything about everything.

Not so crazy about: people who don’t think before they act, or don’t understand why she used THEIR things to build a new invention…
characters.name: Olivia
characters.title: Olivia

characters.description:
Mia is an adventurer who loves animals and being outdoors. In fact, she’s pretty sure her horse Bella understands her better than most people. She gets things done, and often while her four best friends are still discussing how to do it! She knows who she is and never worries much about what other people think of her. She doesn’t like gossip or small talk. Just be honest with her, she’ll see right through anyone who isn’t! And she’s not afraid to let them know.

Loves: skateboarding, animals, nature, honesty, alone time.

Not so crazy about: long discussions, people who tell her something is impossible.
characters.name: Mia
characters.title: Mia

trackingData.name: Andrea’s Park Performance 41334 – LEGO® Friends – Product animation

set.description: Take center stage for an afternoon of performances in Heartlake City Park, starting with a puppet show! Help the dad and his baby sit down on a bench to watch the show, then press the piano keys at the back of the stage to help the puppets move about! Afterwards, rotate the stage background to help Andrea and her pet bird Pepper put on a beautiful musical performance together. Then head to the hot dog stand for a snack after the show.

image.alt: LEGO Friends Andrea's Park Performance - 41334 - Take center stage with Andrea for an afternoon of performances, starting with a puppet show! Help the dad and his baby sit down on the bench, press the piano keys at the back of the stage and watch pet bird Pepper put on a beautiful musical performance together with Andrea. After the show head to the hot dog stand for a snack.

_source.description: Stephanie has a plan. Well, she always has plans for everything she does – but when it comes to the Heartlake City go-kart championship, her plan is to help as many drivers as possible compete in the race. Vicky, the reigning go-kart champion, acts like a real menace towards all the young new drivers to scare them away from HER tracks. There is no way Stephanie is letting her get away with that! Go-kart racing is a team sport, and everyone should be able to race if they want. There is no room for bullies! And Stephanie knows just how to clear the path to victory…
_source.name: Meet Sporty Stephanie - LEGO Friends Character Spot
_source.shortDescription: Meet Sporty Stephanie! – LEGO® Friends Videos and Webisodes – LEGO.com
_source.title: Meet Sporty Stephanie! – LEGO® Friends Character Spot

characters.description:
Stephanie is an amazing swimmer and lifeguard. Health and sports are her passion. She loves being around her four BFFs, organizing their daily events, nurturing any hurt feelings and coaching them toward victory. She sets high standards for herself. She loves helping others, but she sometimes freaks out when she feels like it’s all down to her.

Loves: planning new missions, going on rescue missions, secret missions, helping others be the best they can be.

Not so crazy about: being alone, risk of failing at something, improvising.
characters.name: Stephanie
characters.title: Stephanie

trackingData.name: Meet Sporty Stephanie! – LEGO® Friends Character Spot

_source.description: The LEGO® Friends are shocked at the state of the beach – trash everywhere, and the animals are suffering! Come along on a deep-sea adventure as Emma searches for beautiful images for her sea life documentary and pledges to become a Sea Life Friend. Would you like to become a Sea Life Friend too? After watching the video, don’t forget to Push & Pledge at lego.com/sealifefriends

set.description: Head to Heartlake City Park in Olivia’s Mission Vehicle—there’s a cat who needs her help! Olivia and her robot Zobo have everything they need to make sure all is well in Heartlake City. Put Zobo in his rooftop control center to monitor the situation, while Olivia sets up the ladder to rescue the little cat from the tree. When he's safe and sound, drive off to find Olivia's friends—there's room for them all inside!

Her mission: build a scooter to tow it around the park!

_source.description:
Watch the brand new “Zoom Zoom Zoom” music video from LEGO® Friends! 
Olivia has a dream: She wants the five Friends to win the legendary Heartlake City go-kart race in the coolest cars ever! There’s only one problem… All they have are five worn-out go-karts to work with. How can they beat reigning champion Vicky Roman in those old wrecks? It’s time for some good old teamwork. Can the Friends design, upgrade and customize their go-karts in time to win the race? One thing is for sure – nothing can stop them from trying! And hey, it doesn’t hurt to have a cool team hit song to boost their motivation, right? 

Watch more LEGO Friends videos here on YouTube.
_source.name: Zoom Zoom Zoom-LEGO Friends-Music Video
_source.shortDescription: Watch the official “Zoom Zoom Zoom” LEGO® Friends music video. Can the five Friends fix and customize the old go-karts and beat everyone to the finish line?

_source.description:
Welcome to the official LEGO® Friends Heartlake City Resort House Tour!
Get a first-hand look at all the cool details, functions and features of this cool LEGO Friends set. Leave your shoes on, and follow your hosts,
Apheniand Grace, as they meet Olivia and Andrea at the reception area to pick up their keys! After checking in to their rooms, the two Friends are off to see the rest of the resort on the cool hop on/hop off monorail. What a cool way to get around on your vacation! But where to first? The juice bar with the spectacular view of the resort, of course! Then it’s on to the fun water park where you have fun on the two big slides, or go sailing on water scooters. What happens when lifeguards Stephanie and Mason suddenly spot kids in danger? At the end of the tour, you’re invited to a big party with DJ Andrea!
_source.name: LLCOM-Friends_Heartlake City Resort House Tour_US_Sep18
_source.shortDescription: The Official Heartlake City Resort House Tour - LEGO Friends Videos and webisodes - LEGO.com US
_source.title: The Official Heartlake City Resort House Tour – LEGO® Friends Videos

trackingData.name: The Official Heartlake City Resort House Tour – LEGO® Friends Videos

set.description: Whizz down the slides into the ocean at LEGO® Friends 41347 Heartlake City Resort water park and dodge the splash bucket when it tips! Windsurf or hop on the water scooter and pull Andrea along in the parasailer for an amazing view of the beach. Look! There's a dolphin! Catch up with Mason the lifeguard and then take the monorail back to the hotel and chill out in the juice bar, or head to the roof terrace for a beachside party with this vacation-themed LEGO® Friends set.

_source.description: Olivia is a tech girl on a mission as she and her robot Zobo solve not one, not two, but THREE missions in Heartlake City Park! Join Olivia as she helps others fetch a balloon, retrieve a teddy bear, and rescue a cat stuck in a tree – all in one afternoon. You’ll have loads of fun with LEGO® bricks using your creativity and imagination to solve these fun tasks! LEGO Friends – where friends have fun helping others.
_source.name: Olivia and the Mission Van to the Rescue Heartlake City Missions

_source.description:
Meet Emma from LEGO® Friends, an aspiring creative character who can bring out beauty and inspire creativity in everyone she meets. Join Emma and her cat for a day of imagination and inspiration in Heartlake City Park. Help her paint a portrait of her friends – it will make a great gift for them! It’s a day of friends having fun in the sun. 

LEGO® Friends – we’ve got heart!

set.description: Emma is towing her art stand behind her cool little scooter to set up in Heartlake City Park—her favorite place to paint caricatures. Swing open the windows to show the paintings she has for sale today and help her operate the cash register. Settle her cat Chico down in his bed for a nap, while Emma sits at the easel to work on her latest masterpiece—her best friends are always her greatest inspiration!

_source.description:
The five best LEGO® Friends from Heartlake City sure stick together through thick and thin!
 Watch clips of some of their funniest, favorite friendship moments and daring adventures – from sleepovers, sports, song contests and science fun to saving ducklings, burning buildings or the entire city!


 No challenge is too small or too big. As long as they’ve got their hearts in the right place, anything is possible.
_source.name: Funniest Friendship Moments Fun in Heartlake City
_source.shortDescription: The world of LEGO® Friends is all about discovering who you are, what your passions are, and building those awesome childhood memories together!
_source.title: Funniest Friendship Moments! Fun in Heartlake City | Music Video – LEGO® Friends

_source.description: Meet Emma. She’s on her way to meet her four best friends. But before she can make it to their club house in Heartlake City, she sees someone in trouble who needs her help! Luckily, Emma is always ready to draw, cut, glue and tape a rescue mission together and save the day!
_source.name: meet-emma
_source.shortDescription: Introducing creative Emma in this video from LEGO® Friends. On her way to meet her friends, she uses drawing, glue, cutting and tape on a rescue mission.
_source.title: Meet the LEGO® Friends – Emma

characters.description:
Emma is an artist. She can’t go anywhere without drawing, painting or taking pictures of all the beautiful things she sees. She has the quirkiest brain: she can imagine and create things no one else can. She loves telling jokes, even if no one else gets them. She really wants to keep secrets but it’s just SO HARD! She trusts in the best in everyone, even if they don’t always deserve it.

Loves: Art, drawing, having fun, seeing the world through crazy, homemade glasses, starting new creative projects.

Not so crazy about: finishing creative projects, deciding which idea to go with or keeping track of time.
characters.name: Emma
characters.title: Emma

characters.description:

Loves: singing, having FUN, using her talent to make a difference in the world, feeling spoiled.

characters.description:
Mia is an adventurer who loves animals and being outdoors. In fact, she’s pretty sure her horse Bella understands her better than most people. She gets things done, and often while her four best friends are still discussing how to do it! She knows who she is and never worries much about what other people think of her. She doesn’t like gossip or small talk. Just be honest with her, she’ll see right through anyone who isn’t! And she’s not afraid to let them know.

Loves: skateboarding, animals, nature, honesty, alone time.

Not so crazy about: long discussions, people who tell her something is impossible.

characters.description:
Stephanie is an amazing swimmer and lifeguard. Health and sports are her passion. She loves being around her four BFFs, organizing their daily events, nurturing any hurt feelings and coaching them toward victory. She sets high standards for herself. She loves helping others, but she sometimes freaks out when she feels like it’s all down to her.

Loves: planning new missions, going on rescue missions, secret missions, helping others be the best they can be.

Not so crazy about: being alone, risk of failing at something, improvising.

_source.description: What better way to celebrate Friendship Day (or any other day, really :D) than with a fun LEGO® Friends build-along event? Apheni and Grace are back, and ready to try out all the cool builds from the 41346 Friendship Box together. And this time, they’re joined by their friends for even more fun and games! With this set, you and your friends can build and play with life-size LEGO Friends walkie-talkies, a trophy, Zobo the robot, a camera, and a microphone. They’re so easy to build: Just find the right bag, and follow the building instructions. Who will you invite over to build and play with all your hearts?

set.description: Have loads of fun building life-sized LEGO® Friends accessories to play with, taking you and your friends right to the heart of the Heartlake action. Each model in this amazing LEGO® Friends 41346 Friendship Box represents one of the girls from Heartlake City. Sing into the microphone like Andrea, create a robot friend like Olivia, take a pair of walkie-talkies on an adventure with Mia, win a sporting trophy like Stephanie or snap away with the camera on an Emma-style photo shoot. There are enough bricks to build all 5 at the same time!

_source.description: Welcome to Stephanie’s House! She and her pet bunny, Daisy, will be your hosts on your tour of Stephanie’s beautiful room, the cool swing, her mom’s office, their warm/cozy living room, and last, but not least, the kitchen, where Stephanie works her cupcake magic.

includedSets.description: Stephanie spends most of her time baking in the kitchen—and you can help her make a cake to enjoy with her friends later. Help her dad, James, to vacuum the lounge before feeding Chili the baby rabbit outside. Head up the sweeping staircase to help mom Alicia working in the office and then to the bedroom to get ready. Then sit Stephanie in the swing chair on the porch, ready for her friends to join her.

_source.description: Meet Mia. It’s just a normal day in Heartlake City, and Mia is going horseback riding before meeting her four friends. Or so she thinks! A dangerous criminal is on the run, and before she can stop to think, Mia and her horse Bella are in hot pursuit! Can she trap him and save the day?
_source.name: meet-mia
_source.shortDescription: Meet cool and confident Mia in this video from LEGO® Friends. She was just going horseback riding, but suddenly she is in a wild pursuit of a criminal.
_source.title: Meet the LEGO® Friends – Mia

characters.description:
Mia is an adventurer who loves animals and being outdoors. In fact, she’s pretty sure her horse Bella understands her better than most people. She gets things done, and often while her four best friends are still discussing how to do it! She knows who she is and never worries much about what other people think of her. She doesn’t like gossip or small talk. Just be honest with her, she’ll see right through anyone who isn’t! And she’s not afraid to let them know.

Loves: skateboarding, animals, nature, honesty, alone time.

Not so crazy about: long discussions, people who tell her something is impossible.
